channel.title: Survival Pits (Java)
channel.description:
Hello.
I have recently been wanting to learn more about Java, so I am attempting to create a Java variation of Boxhead Rooms (named Survival Pits).
There is no current proof of development, as I have just started recently..
If anyone would like to assist me through the creation of this game, contact me by: MSN: Justin.persinger@gmail.com
Note: I will post more about this as the game is father into development.

item.title: Survival Pits (Java)
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“project fallout, post:2, topic:378573”]You plan on making a 3d game as your first project? Don’t even try, bro. Do something simple, then go up.

*I just played it, noticed it’s sprites rather than models, nvm on the 3d part…[/quote]
Yeah, it’s all sprites.

I’m having trouble with overlapping sprites with a slight offset… Such as, the guns.
If you’ve played it you know what I mean.
Can anyone explain to me how this could be done?

Read full topic
